JobPositionInformation.PositionTitle: Warehouse employee for a company in Auning
JobPositionInformation.Purpose:
The job

For our customer in Auning, we are looking for a forklift driver for dayshifts. The customer is the Nordic region's leader in shop fitting and store design. They have more than 400 employees that design furniture solutions for larger retail companies and brands such as JYSK, MATAS and companies like those.

Your primary tasks

  • Picking and packing
  • Loading trucks
  • Ad hoc tasks
  • Receive goods

As part of the warehousing team, you will help to ensure that goods are delivered to customers on time. It is therefore important that you want to be a part of the team.

We would like you to have experience with warehouse work and forklift driving.

Our exceptions of you:

  • Truckcertificate
  • Has a good understanding of IT
  • Have a positive attitude and a good mood
  • Flexible
  • Not afraid to help where you are needed
  • Can speak and understand Danish or English

Work hours:

Start will as quick as possible

The temporary position will generally be 2-3 months with the possibility of extension.

Working hours are Monday - Thursday at 7.00 - 15.15 (Friday 7.00 - 14.45).

Interessted?

If you do not already have a profile at Moment, you will be asked to create one as the first step in the application process.
